instruction: Summarize the last chapter of a novel.
input: The novel is “A Little Princess” by Frances Hodgson Burnett.
output: The last chapter of A Little Princess by Frances Hodgson Burnett was a joyous conclusion to Sara's story. Miss Minchin and her students were surprised when Mr. Carrisford came back with a treasure trove of evidence that Sara had been telling the truth all along. She was reunited with her beloved father and they both returned to India, fulfilling Sara's promise to keep the diamond mines safe. After years of hardship and mistreatment, Sara finally found her happily ever after.
